The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
The Rivers and Beacon-hills of Gondor

wikitext.*:
On [[30 June]] [[1969]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Paul Bibire]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 743</ref>

*'''Comment:''' Provided by [[Christopher Tolkien]] and [[Paul Bibire]] for [[Carl F. Hostetter]]'s introduction to "[[The Rivers and Beacon-hills of Gondor]]".
*'''Publication:''' A partial transcription of the letter is found in [[Vinyar Tengwar 42|''Vinyar Tengwar'', issue 42]], pp. 6–7.  It was reprinted along with the rest of the article in ''[[The Nature of Middle-earth]]'' pp.  377—379. 
{{references}}
